an9.93:1.1: “For insight into greed, nine things should be developed.
an9.93:1.3: The perceptions of ugliness, death, repulsiveness of food, dissatisfaction with the whole world, impermanence, suffering in impermanence, not-self in suffering, giving up, and fading away.
an9.93:1.4: For insight into greed, these nine things should be developed.”
